member.name: T:HTColorV2
member.summary: Before use this module, Please import first: import "Sensors\HTColorV2" The HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 module made by OFDL Taiwan.

member.name: M:getID
member.summary: Get HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 Color ID.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getRGBW
member.summary: Get HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 RGBW value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getPassiveRGBW
member.summary: Get HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 Passive RGBW value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getRawRGBW
member.summary: Get HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 Raw RGBW value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getHSVL
member.summary: Get HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 HSVL value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:set50Hz
member.summary: Set HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 to 50Hz mode.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:set60Hz
member.summary: Set HiTechnic Color Sensor V2 to 60Hz mode.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
